# `plumber` 헬로 월드 {#plumber-helloworld}

```{r run-plumber,eval=FALSE}
library(plumber)
r <- plumb("deploy/plumber.R")
r$run(port=8000)
```


```{r run-helloworld}
library(httr)
library(tidyverse)
GET('http://localhost:8000/echo?msg="Hello_World"') %>% 
  content()
```
